Server Actions/Target Model: Use the base model of the action
Server Actions/Python Code: # Available locals: #  - time, datetime, dateutil: Python libraries #  - env: Odoo Environement #  - model: Model of the record on which the action is triggered #  - object: Record on which the action is triggered if there is one, otherwise None #  - workflow: Workflow engine #  - Warning: Warning Exception to use with raise # To return an action, assign: action = {...} autoreslist = env["esms.autoresponse"].search([('from_mobile','=',object.to_mobile), ('keyword','=',object.sms_content)]) if len(autoreslist) > 0:     autores = autoreslist[0]     env[object.account_id.account_gateway.gateway_model_name].send_message(object.account_id.id, object.to_mobile, object.from_mobile, autores.sms_content, object.model_id.model, object.record_id, object.field_id.name)
